Changelog
=========

1.2.0
-----
 - updated TALES *provider* expression to be able to define a custom content provider during
   traversal using request a "provider:name" annotation, instead of using a classical adapter
   lookup

1.1.0
-----
 - updated doctests
 - removed ZCML directives

1.0.2
-----
 - updated Travis-CI configuration

1.0.1
-----
 - updated doctests

1.0.0
-----
 - initial release
